children.text:
Tiffany McGary-Cyprian is a Nurse by trade and the Founder and Operator of non-profit organization, Project Blessings All Year Round Organization (2013). Tiffany is a Fidelity Bank P.O.W.E.R. member as well as her organization is a Community Partner with Fidelity Bank. Her organization is where her heart is and where you can find her putting all her efforts to work. Tiffany serves her community on different levels. Tiffany has 4 wonderful children, Nicholas, Anissa, Adrain and Melburn Jr. and 3 grandchildren. Her personality and passion for others is like no others .
Tiffany’s hobbies are serving people, spending time with her grandchildren, teaching/coaching basketball and learning new ways to be a support system of those in need. Tiffany has worked with many organizations & developed several programs in disaster relief, community school supply drives, Christmas holiday adopt a child adopt a senior project and the development of veteran transition homes to help homeless veterans.
Tiffany has received multiple awards from her state, city and community .
She was chosen as the New Orleans Saints Community Quarterback recipient, Northshore HERO award recipient , Professional Women Of ST. Tammany, Louisiana Governor’s Volunteer Champion, City of Covington Volunteer of the year award recipient & in June she was the recipient of the Crown Me Foundation Gala’s Image Award & elected recently as the 2022-2023 VFW 7286 Auxiliary President .
Tiffany is a 20 year Breast Cancer Survivor.
Tiffany’s mission & vision is to serve those in need . Her favorite words are “I’m one woman on one Mission with one vision to change the world” her favorite bible quote is “I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.”
Her talent and her gift is to heal beyond her title !
